thread.title: Glenda Brinckman

author: Glenda Brinckman
title: Glenda Brinckman
text: From the minute we enquired about purchasing a car through big box cars we new we were in great hands. The professionalism and honesty of Johnathon was first class. Johnathon made the trade and sale stress and hassle free as I trusted him completely as he only had my best intrest at hand. Johnathon knew exactly what I was looking for and never stopped untill he found the right car. The car I purchased was my dream car and I thank Johnathon and big box cars for making my dream come true. Johnathon also checked in a week post sale just to make sure I was happy. I would definitely recommend big box cars to my friends and family.
